page.title: 11LIFESTYLES SHOPPING
page.content:
{Shops. In the whole area there are only 5 shops.
At{Knowl Hill }there is a {General {Store and Sub Post Office Another small general store that is also a {Newsagents. There is a specialist {Tool Shop} too.
The other two shops..... a{Farmshop} and a {Camping Shop} are at {Hare Hatch}sharing the land by Kennedy's Garden Centre.
People choose to do most of their shopping at the larger shops and supermarkets in Twyford, Reading and Maidenhead where prices are lower.
Most families go by car once a week to do all their shopping in town.
